action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X X ▢
X X X X X
▢ ▢ X X ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 square grid. Starting from the top row, there is a single 'X' in the third position. In the second row, there are two 'X's in the third and fourth positions. The third row is filled with 'X's in all five positions. The fourth row has two 'X's in the third and fourth positions, mirroring the second row. The fifth and final row mirrors the first row, with a single 'X' in the third position.
continue
